description: Recto: Historiated initial 'O'? with gilding, elaborate border decoration; Verso: Antiphonal staves with notes and inscription in pencil: 'Comunicanda para la S. 7me Trinidad', upper center. No illuminations. Color may be tempera; painted on vellum or parchment.
medium: Ink and color (tempera?) and gilding on vellum
provenance: James H. Leslie, Minneapolis, until 1975; given to MIA.
title: Leaf from an Antiphonary
